response.overview: If you love hot sexy Android Women obeying your every command, then you have come to the right world. For the first time Technosexuals, ASFR (Alt.Sex.Fetish.Robots), and Robot Fetishists alike now have a movie series that caters to their specific technological sexual proclivity.  Series 2: One Day, Little Red RosieBot was walking through the forest on the way home to her Master. She has been ordered to pick up some supplies and bring them back before it was dark. Dr. Fires had also warned her not to talk to any strangers along the way, that humans were not to be trusted. Rosie picked up her pace knowing the sun would be setting in a matter of minutes and did not want to disobey her Master. As she moved swiftly through the forest she all of a sudden freezes. Her sensors were picking up rapid movement within meters of her.
response.title: SciFi DreamGirls 2: The Creation
